name: TrackFileSystemView
description:
Log and track a file system view on resource access.

This tool logs a new view each time a GET request is made on the specified resource, useful for tracking access patterns.

parameters.name: hog_function_uuid
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying the hog function to track.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this hog function.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: A string representing the Project ID of the project to access. Retrieve this ID by calling /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: file_view_request_body
parameters.description: A JSON object including details like id, type, and metadata of the file view to be tracked.

type.description:
* `string` - string
* `number` - number
* `boolean` - boolean
* `dictionary` - dictionary
* `choice` - choice
* `json` - json
* `integration` - integration
* `integration_field` - integration_field
* `email` - email
* `native_email` - native_email
